content.raw:
In last nights testing on my machine, I saw about 33% failures of the transceiver test. I've been testing this branch, and the test has passed 63 times, failing only once due to #774 (it got stuck in an infinite loop of Publisher::WaitForConnection at [ServerFixture.hh:180](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/32c3022375ccf0ccd60efe2167e9b54f8167206f/test/ServerFixture.hh?at=default#cl-180)).

I'll run a few more tests, but this is looking very good.
content.html:
In last nights testing on my machine, I saw about 33% failures of the transceiver test. I've been testing this branch, and the test has passed 63 times, failing only once due to #774 (it got stuck in an infinite loop of Publisher::WaitForConnection at ServerFixture.hh:180).

I'll run a few more tests, but this is looking very good.
